basic_information.scholarship_name: Department of Sociology, Gerontology, and Substance Abuse Studies Scholarship

description: This scholarship recognizes Sociology, Gerontology, or Substance Abuse Studies students who show passion and commitment to their chosen major as evidenced by strong academic performance. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate majoring in Sociology or graduate majoring in Substance Abuse Studies or Gerontology Minimum 3.0 GPA Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded Must provide a writing sample in the form of a paper done of Sociology-Substance Abuse Studies Coursework

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
